name: R5-ObservationDefinition-R4-ObservationDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ObservationDefinition into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition`

element.display: When ObservationDefinition was approved by publisher

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.category`
R5 `ObservationDefinition.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.code`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Quantity | CodeableConcept | string | boolean | integer | Range | Ratio | SampledData | time | dateTime | Period
Set of qualified values for observation results

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.contained`

element.display: Based on FHIR definition of another observation
Natural language description of the ObservationDefinition
Measurement device or model of device
The effective date range for the ObservationDefinition
If for testing purposes, not real usage

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Definitions of related resources belonging to this kind of observation group

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.id`

target.display: Business identifier for this ObservationDefinition instance
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.identifier` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.identifier` - identifier changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.implicitRules`

element.display: Intended jurisdiction for this ObservationDefinition (if applicable)

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Date on which the asset content was last reviewed by the publisher

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.meta`

element.display: Method used to produce the observation

target.display: Method used to produce the observation
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.method` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.method`

R5 `ObservationDefinition.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Multiple results allowed for conforming observations

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.multipleResultsAllowed` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.multipleResultsAllowed`

element.display: Desired kind of performer for such kind of observation
Quantity | CodeableConcept | string | boolean | integer | Range | Ratio | SampledData | time | dateTime | Period

target.display: Quantity | CodeableConcept | string | boolean | integer | Range | Ratio | SampledData | time | dateTime | Period
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.permittedDataType` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.permittedDataType` - permittedDataType has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/permitted-data-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/permitted-data-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: The preferred name to be used when reporting the observation results

target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.preferredReportName` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.preferredReportName`

element.display: The name of the individual or organization that published the ObservationDefinition
Set of qualified values for observation results

target.display: Value set of abnormal coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.abnormalCodedValueSet` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.abnormalCodedValueSet` - abnormalCodedValueSet has change due to type change: R5 abnormalCodedValueSet canonical has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 abnormalCodedValueSet
R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.age` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.age`
R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.appliesTo` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.appliesTo`

target.display: Condition associated with the reference range
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.condition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.condition`
R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.context` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.context`

target.display: Value set of critical coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.criticalCodedValueSet` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.criticalCodedValueSet` - criticalCodedValueSet has change due to type change: R5 criticalCodedValueSet canonical has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 criticalCodedValueSet

R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.gender` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.gender` - gender has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

target.display: Applicable gestational age range, if relevant
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.gestationalAge` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.gestationalAge`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Value set of normal coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.normalCodedValueSet` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.normalCodedValueSet` - normalCodedValueSet has change due to type change: R5 normalCodedValueSet canonical has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 normalCodedValueSet

target.display: The interval itself, for continuous or ordinal observations
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.range` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.range`

R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.rangeCategory` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedInterval.category` - category has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-range-category|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-range-category|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

target.display: Value set of valid coded values for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.qualifiedValue.validCodedValueSet` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ObservationDefinition.validCodedValueSet` - validCodedValueSet has change due to type change: R5 validCodedValueSet canonical has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 validCodedValueSet

element.display: Kind of specimen used by this type of observation
Type of subject for the defined observation
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `ObservationDefinition.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ObservationDefinition.text`

element.display: Logical canonical URL to reference this ObservationDefinition (globally unique)
Content intends to support these contexts
